en.app-description:
Share a virtual room with friends.
Watch videos, play with 3D objects, or just hang out.
en.app-tagline: Private social VR in your web browser
en.auth.verify-failed: Unable to sign in with this link. It may have already been used or has expired.
en.auth.verified:
Your email has been verified!
You can now close this browser tab and return to %app-name%.
en.auth.spoke-verified:
Your email has been verified!
You can now close this browser tab and return to %editor-name%.
en.sign-in.prompt: Sign in to pin objects in rooms.
en.sign-in.admin: Check your email for a verification email. Once verified, enter your email to create your account or sign in.
en.sign-in.admin-no-permission: You don't have access to admin tools. Sign into another account or ask an administrator to grant you permission.
en.sign-in.hub:
An account is required to join rooms.

Enter your email to create your account or sign in.
en.sign-in.auth-started:
Email sent!

To continue, click on the link in the email using your phone, tablet, or PC.

No email? You may not be able to create an account.
en.sign-in.pin: You'll need to sign in to pin objects.
en.sign-in.unpin: You'll need to sign in to un-pin objects.
en.sign-in.change-scene: You'll need to sign in to change the scene.
en.sign-in.room-settings: You'll need to sign in to change the room's settings.
en.sign-in.close-room: You'll need to sign in to close the room.
en.sign-in.mute-user: You'll need to sign in to mute other users.
en.sign-in.kick-user: You'll need to sign in to kick other users.
en.sign-in.add-owner: You'll need to sign in to assign moderators.
en.sign-in.remove-owner: You'll need to sign in to assign moderators.
en.sign-in.create-avatar: You'll need to sign in to create avatars.
en.sign-in.favorite-room: You'll need to sign in to add this room to your favorites.
en.sign-in.favorite-rooms: You'll need to sign in to add favorite rooms.
en.sign-in.tweet: You'll need to sign in to send tweets.
en.room-settings.access-private-subtitle: Only those with the link can join
en.room-info.title: Room & Scene Info
en.close-room.message:
Closing this room will remove yourself and others from the room, shutting it down permanently.

Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.
en.promote.message:
Promoting a user will grant full access to room settings and moderation tools.

Are you sure?
en.entry.in-lobby-notice: You are viewing this room from the lobby.
en.entry.watch-from-lobby-subtitle: Others will not be able to see or hear you
en.entry.desktop.invite-tip: Nobody is here yet. Share this room to get together.
en.profile.display_name.validation_warning: Alphanumerics and hyphens. At least 3 characters, no more than 32
en.avatar-editor.external-editor-info: Create a custom skin for this avatar:
en.avatar-preview.loading-failed:
Loading failed
Please choose another avatar
en.media-browser.empty.images: No results. Try entering a new search above.
en.media-browser.empty.videos: No results. Try entering a new search above.
en.media-browser.empty.youtube: No results. Try entering a new search above.
en.media-browser.empty.gifs: No result. Try entering a new search above.
en.media-browser.empty.sketchfab: No results. Try entering a new search above.
en.media-browser.empty.poly: No results. Try entering a new search above.
en.media-browser.empty.twitch: No results. Try entering a new search above.
en.media-browser.empty.favorites: You don't have any favorites. Click a ⭐ to add to your favorites.
en.audio.title: Audio Setup
en.audio.hmd-mic-warning: Your HMD mic is not chosen
en.audio.grant-subtitle: Mic access needed to be heard by others
en.audio.granted-subtitle: You can still mute yourself in-game
en.exit.subtitle.exited: Your session has ended. Refresh your browser to start a new one.
en.exit.subtitle.closed: This room is no longer available.
en.exit.subtitle.denied: You are not permitted to join this room. Please request permission from the room creator.
en.exit.subtitle.disconnected: You have disconnected from the room. Refresh the page to try to reconnect.
en.exit.subtitle.full: This room is full, please try again later.
en.exit.subtitle.connect_error: Unable to connect to this room, please try again later.
en.exit.subtitle.version_mismatch: The version you deployed is not available yet. Your browser will refresh in 5 seconds.
en.autoexit.title: Auto-ending session in
en.autoexit.idle_subtitle: You have been idle for too long.
en.presence.hub_name_change: changed the name of the room to
en.home.create_name.validation_warning: Invalid name, limited to 4 to 64 characters and limited symbols.
en.link.try_again:
We couldn't find that code.
Please try again.
en.scene.create_button: Create a room with this scene
en.scene.unavailable: This scene is no longer available.
en.link.in_your_browser: In your device's web browser, go to:
en.link.enter_code: Then, enter this one-time letter code:
en.link.do_not_close:
Your account and avatar will be transferred to the device.
Keep this page open to use this code.
en.invite.embed-tip:
Please be mindful of where you embed a %app-name% room.
Go to Room Settings to lock down permissions for this room.
en.preferences.promptForRefresh: Your preferences are saved, but some of your changes will not take effect until you refresh the page.
en.preferences.enableOnScreenJoystickLeft: Enable left on-screen joystick for moving around
en.preferences.enableOnScreenJoystickRight: Enable right on-screen joystick for looking around
en.preferences.invertTouchscreenCameraMove: Invert direction of camera movement for touchscreens
en.preferences.allowMultipleHubsInstances: Disable auto-exit when multiple hubs instances are open
en.preferences.disableIdleDetection: Disable auto-exit when idle or backgrounded
en.tips.mobile.pen_mode: Tap icon again to end drawing.
en.tips.mobile.mute_mode: You are muted. Tap to unmute.
en.tips.mobile.look: Welcome! 👋 Tap and drag to look around.
en.tips.mobile.locomotion: Great! To move, pinch with two fingers.
en.tips.mobile.spawn_menu-post: at the top to create objects.
en.tips.mobile.object_grab: Drag an object to move or throw it.
en.tips.mobile.object_recenter_button-post: to have the object face you.
en.tips.mobile.object_pin: Pin an object to save it to the room.
en.tips.mobile.invite: Use the Share button to share this room.
en.tips.desktop.video_share_mode: You're streaming. Select again to stop sharing video.
en.tips.desktop.pen_mode: Press ESC or right click to drop pen. Ctrl-Z to undo.
en.tips.desktop.mute_mode: You are muted. Click or press M to un-mute.
en.tips.desktop.look: Welcome to %app-name%! Let's take a quick tour. 👋 Click and drag to look around.
en.tips.desktop.locomotion: Use the W A S D keys to move. Hold shift to boost.
en.tips.desktop.turning: Perfect. Use the Q and E keys to rotate.
en.tips.desktop.spawn_menu-post: button at the top of the screen, or press Ctrl 1 through 7.
en.tips.desktop.freeze_gesture: Press and hold spacebar to show object menus.
en.tips.desktop.menu_hover: Now, point the cursor at an object to show the menu.
en.tips.desktop.object_grab: Click and drag an object to move it. Or, flick to throw it!
en.tips.desktop.object_pin: Pin an object to save it to the room.
en.tips.desktop.object_zoom: Scroll to move this object towards and away from you.
en.tips.desktop.object_recenter_button-post: to rotate the object to face you. Helpful if you drop it!
en.tips.desktop.object_scale: Hold shift and scroll to scale it bigger and smaller.
en.tips.desktop.pen_color: Use Shift-Q and Shift-E to change the pen color.
en.tips.desktop.pen_size: Hold Shift and scroll to change the pen size.
en.tips.desktop.invite: Nobody else is here. Use the Share button at the top to share this room.
en.tips.desktop.video_share_failed: You need to grant permissions to stream video.
en.tips.streaming: Now broadcasting to the lobby. Click to exit.
en.tips.desktop.watching: You're in the lobby. Others cannot see or hear you.
en.tips.desktop.feedback: 🦆 Quack! Want to help us make Hubs better?
en.change-scene-dialog.create-in-spoke: Or, create a new scene using %editor-name%.
en.invalid-scene-url: This URL does not point to a scene or valid GLB.
en.discord.primary_tagline:
Share a virtual room with your community.
Watch videos, play with 3D objects, or just hang out.
en.discord.secondary_tagline: No downloads or sign up. Full VR support too.
en.object-info.no-media: There is no media in the room yet
en.leave-room-dialog.join-room.message: Joining a new room will leave this one. Are you sure?
en.leave-room-dialog.create-room.message: Creating a new room will leave this one. Are you sure?
en.embed.presence-warning: This room is embedded, so may be visible to visitors on other websites.
en.oauth-dialog.message.twitter: Connect to Twitter to send tweets from %app-name%.
en.cloud.primary_tagline:
Hubs Cloud deploys server infrastructure for private,
collaborative 3D rooms that can be accessed on your
desktop, mobile phone, or VR headset.
en.cloud.secondary_tagline: Get it today on the AWS Marketplace.
en.cloud.splash_tag: Configurable infrastructure for your own Hubs stack

cn-zh.app-description:
与朋友一起分享虚拟房间。
看视频，体验3D效果，或是跟朋友一起玩耍。
cn-zh.app-tagline: 在你浏览器里的私人社交VR（虚拟现实）
cn-zh.auth.verify-failed: .无法通过此链接登录，链接可能已经使用过或是已过期
cn-zh.auth.verified:
你的邮箱已被确认!
你可以关闭浏览器网页，回到%app-name%。
cn-zh.auth.spoke-verified:
你的邮箱已被确认!
你可以关闭浏览器网页，回到%editor-name%。
cn-zh.sign-in.prompt: 只有登陆才可以在房间放置物品。
cn-zh.sign-in.admin: 查看你邮箱里的确认邮件。确认后, 输入你的邮箱创建或是登陆账户。
cn-zh.sign-in.admin-no-permission: 你无权使用管理工具。请登录另外的账号或请求管理员授予你权限。
cn-zh.sign-in.hub:
加入房间需要登录账户

输入邮箱创建或是登陆账户。
cn-zh.sign-in.auth-started:
邮件已发送!

下一步, 用你的手机，平板电脑或是个人电脑进入邮箱点击链接。

未收到邮件? 你可能无法创建账户。
cn-zh.sign-in.pin: 只有登陆才可以在房间放置物品。
cn-zh.sign-in.unpin: 只有登陆才可以在房间移除物品。
cn-zh.sign-in.change-scene: 只有登陆才可以改变场景。
cn-zh.sign-in.room-settings: 只有登陆才可以改变房间设置。
cn-zh.sign-in.close-room: 只有登陆才可以关闭房间。
cn-zh.sign-in.mute-user: 只有登陆才可以噤声他人。
cn-zh.sign-in.kick-user: 只有登陆才可以把他人踢出房间。
cn-zh.sign-in.add-owner: 只有登陆才可以指定主持人。
cn-zh.sign-in.remove-owner: 只有登陆才可以指定主持人。
cn-zh.sign-in.create-avatar: 只有登陆才可以创建头像。
cn-zh.sign-in.favorite-room: 只有登陆才可以把此房间添加为最爱房间。
cn-zh.sign-in.favorite-rooms: 只有登陆才可以添加房间到最爱房间。
cn-zh.sign-in.tweet: 只有登陆才可以发送信息。
cn-zh.room-info.title: 房间&场景信息
cn-zh.close-room.message:
关闭这个房间会把你与朋友都移除这个房间，会永久关闭.

确定? 该操作不能撤销
cn-zh.promote.message:
晋升一个用户，会给他房间设置以及使用工具的权限

你确定吗?
cn-zh.entry.in-lobby-notice: 你正在休息室欣赏房间
cn-zh.entry.watch-from-lobby-subtitle: 其他人不会看到或听到你
cn-zh.entry.desktop.invite-tip: 这里还没有人，分享这个房间给其他人吧
cn-zh.profile.display_name.validation_warning: 字母数字与连字符号。至少三个字母，不要超过32个
cn-zh.avatar-editor.info: 发现更多自定义头像资源
cn-zh.avatar-preview.loading-failed:
加载失败
请选择其他的头像
cn-zh.media-browser.empty.images: 没有结果。试着输入新搜索。
cn-zh.media-browser.empty.videos: 没有结果。试着输入新搜索。

cn-zh.media-browser.empty.favorites: 你没有添加任何喜爱。 点击⭐ 把它加入你的收藏中
cn-zh.audio.title: 语音设置
cn-zh.audio.subtitle-desktop: 确认HMD（头戴式显示器）扬声器输出
cn-zh.audio.hmd-mic-warning: 你的HMD（头戴式显示器）话筒没有选中
cn-zh.audio.grant-subtitle: 授权的话筒可以被其他人听见
cn-zh.exit.subtitle.exited: 会话结束。刷新浏览器开始新会话。
cn-zh.exit.subtitle.denied: 你不被允许进入此房间，你需要获得房间创始人的允许
cn-zh.exit.subtitle.disconnected: 房间连接中断。刷新网页重新获得连接
cn-zh.exit.subtitle.connect_error: 无法连接到房间, 请稍后再试。
cn-zh.exit.subtitle.version_mismatch: 你部署的版本不可用。你的浏览器会在5秒钟后刷新。
cn-zh.autoexit.title: 会话将在
cn-zh.autoexit.concurrent_subtitle: 你已经开始了新的会话
cn-zh.autoexit.idle_subtitle: 你已经长时间没有进行操作.
cn-zh.home.create_name.validation_warning: 无效的名字, 仅限4~64个字母与符号
cn-zh.link.try_again:
无法找到此号码
请重试。
cn-zh.scene.create_button: 用此场景新建一个房间
cn-zh.link.in_your_browser: 在你设备网页浏览器里, 进入:
cn-zh.link.enter_code: 然后输入这个一次性的码:
cn-zh.link.do_not_close:
你的账户与头像将会转移到设备上.
请在此页上使用号码
cn-zh.invite.duration_of_code: 每72小时产生一次新号码
cn-zh.invite.or_visit_modal: 或是通过永久链接访问
cn-zh.invite.embed-tip:
在你嵌入 %app-name% 房间在你的网页里时请留心.
到房间设置里封锁房间的权限。
cn-zh.commands.duck: 这个鸭子尝起来不错，呱
cn-zh.preferences.enableOnScreenJoystickLeft: 允许使用屏幕上左侧的操纵杆四处走动
cn-zh.preferences.enableOnScreenJoystickRight: 允许使用屏幕上右侧的操纵杆四处走动
cn-zh.preferences.onlyShowNametagsInFreeze: 当停止不动时只显示用户标签
cn-zh.preferences.maxResolution: 最大分辨率 (宽 x 高 以像素为单位)
cn-zh.preferences.allowMultipleHubsInstances: 当多个hubs打开时暂停自动离开功能
cn-zh.preferences.disableIdleDetection: 当没在使用或是后台运行时暂停自动离开功能
cn-zh.preferences.preferMobileObjectInfoPanel: 优先移动对象信息版面
cn-zh.preferences.disableAutoPixelRatio: 禁用像素比例自动调整
cn-zh.preferences.disableEchoCancellation: 禁用麦克风回音消除 (需要重启)
cn-zh.preferences.disableNoiseSuppression: 禁用麦克风噪声抑制 (需要重启)
cn-zh.preferences.disableAutoGainControl: 禁止麦克风自动获得控制权 (需要重启)
cn-zh.settings.room-info: 房间&场景信息 & Scene Info
cn-zh.tips.mobile.pen_mode: 再次点击图标停止绘画。
cn-zh.tips.mobile.mute_mode: 你现在处于静音模式，点击取消静音
cn-zh.tips.mobile.look: 欢迎! 👋 用鼠标点击或者拖拽参观四周。
cn-zh.tips.mobile.locomotion: 很好! 移动的话，用两根手指
cn-zh.tips.mobile.object_grab: 拖动物品可以移动或扔掉它
cn-zh.tips.mobile.object_pin: 在物品上标记可以把它保存在房间里
cn-zh.tips.mobile.invite: 使用分享按钮分享此房间。
cn-zh.tips.mobile.feedback: 🦆 呱! 想要帮助 Hubs吗?
cn-zh.tips.desktop.video_share_mode: 你正在 streaming. 重新选择可以停止视频分享
cn-zh.tips.desktop.pen_mode: 敲击 ESC 键或者点击右键扔掉笔 敲击Ctrl-Z 可以撤销
cn-zh.tips.desktop.mute_mode: 处在静音模式. 点击或是按M键取消静音
cn-zh.tips.desktop.look: 欢迎来到 %app-name%! 我们开始一个快速的介绍。 👋 点击拖拽四处查看
cn-zh.tips.desktop.locomotion: 使用 W A S D 键来移动。 按shift键快速移动
cn-zh.tips.desktop.turning: 好极了. 使用 Q and E 键旋转
cn-zh.tips.desktop.spawn_menu-post: 屏幕上方按钮, 或者按 Ctrl 1 through 7.
cn-zh.tips.desktop.freeze_gesture: 敲击空格键显示物品菜单
cn-zh.tips.desktop.menu_hover: 现在, 把鼠标放在物品上会显示菜单
cn-zh.tips.desktop.object_grab: 点击拖动物体. 或者, 投掷它!
cn-zh.tips.desktop.object_pin: 在物品上标记可以把它保存在房间里
cn-zh.tips.desktop.object_zoom: 滚动鼠标可以让物品靠近或者远离你
cn-zh.tips.desktop.object_recenter_button-post: 转动物品让它面对你。 扔在地上也会有帮助!
cn-zh.tips.desktop.object_scale: 按住 shift 键 滚动鼠标，可以放大或者缩小
cn-zh.tips.desktop.pen_color: 用 Shift-Q 与 Shift-E 按键改变笔的颜色
cn-zh.tips.desktop.pen_size: 按住 Shift键 滚动鼠标，可以改变笔的大小
cn-zh.tips.desktop.invite: 没人在这里。 使用顶部的按钮分享此房间
cn-zh.tips.desktop.video_share_failed: 你需要授权才可以 stream 视频。
cn-zh.tips.streaming: 现在传输到休息室。点击离开。
cn-zh.tips.desktop.watching: 你在休息室， 没有人可以看见听到你。
cn-zh.tips.desktop.feedback: 🦆 呱! 想帮助我们让 Hubs 更好吗?
cn-zh.change-scene-dialog.create-in-spoke: 或者, 使用 %editor-name%新建一个场景。
cn-zh.invalid-scene-url: 这个链接无法打开场景或是有效的GLB.
cn-zh.discord.primary_tagline:
与你的社区分享虚拟房间。
看视频，体验3D效果，或是跟朋友一起玩耍。
cn-zh.discord.secondary_tagline: 不需要下载或是注册，支持全部VR。
cn-zh.discord.splash_tag: 为严格的商业活动定制
cn-zh.leave-room-dialog.join-room.message: 加入新房间会离开当前房间，你确定吗?
cn-zh.leave-room-dialog.create-room.message: 加入新房间会离开当前房间，你确定吗
cn-zh.embed.presence-warning: 此房间是系统自带房间, 游客可能通过他们的网页看到此房间。
cn-zh.oauth-dialog.message.twitter: 连接 Twitter 从 %app-name% 发送 tweets
cn-zh.cloud.primary_tagline:
Hubs Cloud 部署私人服务器设施,
可以通过你的电脑手机VR头盔
进入到合作的3D房间.
cn-zh.cloud.splash_tag: 为你自己的 Hubs stack可配置的基础设施
